document_notes.text:
This update for MozillaFirefox fixes security issues.

The following vulnerabilities were fixed in Firefox ESR 45.5.1 (bbsc#1012964):

- CVE-2016-9079: Use-after-free in SVG Animation could be used for code execution (MFSA 2016-92 bsc#1012964)

notes.text: A use-after-free vulnerability in SVG Animation has been discovered. An exploit built on this vulnerability has been discovered in the wild targeting Firefox and Tor Browser users on Windows. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 50.0.2, Firefox ESR < 45.5.1, and Thunderbird < 45.5.1.
